cons: Has some unnatural ingredients, including emulsifiers that can be irritating to sensitive skin

pros: Activated charcoal and organic bergamot helps purify and reduce pores

customer_reviews.title: Just Buy It
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer was such a surprise. I've been looking for a replacement for Dermalogica Matte Finish. Pleasantly surprised with this one. My previous ex moisturizer felt it disappears after 1 or 2 hours leaving my face either dry and needing more or my face would be oily from the day. This stays on, leaves my face soft, and more importantly light. Does not get oily nor do I have to reapply. Worth every penny. I've never been so utterly impressed with men's nor women's moisturizers than this one. I would give more stars if I could. This product truly shines with it's cost and worth ratio. Might even say it's a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Valen

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but decent
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a decent moisturizer with a pleasant scent. That being said there are many other cheaper products for which the same can be said. This same effect can be accomplished by simply using a small amount of any lotion. For this reason I do not feel it is worth the money since I cannot liberally apply it without it becoming quite glossy.
customer_reviews.author: Sagade

feature_bullets: MADE FOR ALL MEN - Simply put, this is a Facial Moisturizer for all men, no matter what skin type. Our lightweight, mattifying formula is non-irritating and suitable for sensitive, normal, oily, rough, dry, and acne-prone complexions.
ENERGIZE: Our caffeinated formula will help reduce inflammation and redness which leads to a more energized and youthful look.
NOURISH: Vitamin E assists in cell restoration sun from damage to healing support for scars or burns. Over time, this powerful antioxidant leads to a more healthy and even complexion.

THE BEAU BRUMMELL SIGNATURE SCENT - We've developed a proprietary masculine fragrance consisting of a fresh, green opening, leading into robust earthy notes that trail gently away, leaving behind just a subtle clean and confident scent on the skin. Our scent blend is made entirely of organic essential oils, we never use synthetic fragrances which can clog pores and have negative effects on sensitive skin.

NO HARMFUL INGREDIENTS - All Beau Brummell products are 100% Paraben Free, Sulfate Free, PEG Free, SLS Free, Phthalate Free, Artificial Fragrance Free, Dye Free, Microbead Free, Mineral Oil Free, and more.
